body:
Comment 7: 
From the cited lldb issue:

We can see that the __DWARF segment has an address of zero and has no size. In the
mach-o world everything in the file must have a valid vmaddr and vmsize, so the __DWARF
segment should have an address that comes after the __LINKEDIT section (0x75000 +
0xaef0), and the vmsize must be set correctly so it encompasses all of the "__debug_xxx"
sections. Also each address and size of the "__debug" sections should be set to
correctly fall into __DWARF segment range of [vmaddr, vmsize).
